name: luxury-marketing-analytics-dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for luxury sector marketing campaign analytics

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix ./dashboard && npm run build --prefix ./dashboard
scripts.vercel-build: echo '--- DIAGNOSTICS ---' && pwd && echo 'Listing PWD:' && ls -la && echo 'Listing ./dashboard (if exists):' && ls -la ./dashboard && echo '--- END DIAGNOSTICS ---' && npm install && npm install --prefix ./dashboard && npm run build --prefix ./dashboard
